RestoreSettings.Title: Setting Defaults
RestoreSettings.Confirm:
Are you sure you wish to restore GameSave Manager's settings to their default values?
NOTE: Custom Gamesave Entries are not affected by this.

Associations.ContextMenu: Add a 'GameSave Manager' entry to context menu of supported files

Startup.UpdateCheckOnStartup: Check for program and database updates

General.ShowVerInTitle: Show program version information within Window Title
General.RunAsAdmin: Use 'Program Compatibility' to always run with administrative rights
General.RunAsAdmin_Question:
GameSave Manager currently doesn't appear to be running with Administrative Rights.
Would you like to restart with such rights now?

Cloud.Info: In an effort to keep your saves safe, GameSave Manager can utilize many third party applications to store your saves 'in the cloud'.

BoxSync.Error:
GameSave Manager was unable to detect the Box.net Sync client on your system.
As such, this feature cannot be enabled.
BoxSync.ManuallySpecify: Sync directory not found. Please manually specify it.

Dropbox.Error:
GameSave Manager was unable to detect DropBox running on your system.
As such, this feature cannot be enabled.
Dropbox.ManuallySpecify: Sync directory not found. Please manually specify it.

GDrive.Error:
GameSave Manager was unable to detect Google Drive on your system.
As such, this feature cannot be enabled.
GDrive.ManuallySpecify: Sync directory not found. Please manually specify it.

SkyDrive.Error:
GameSave Manager was unable to detect Microsoft OneDrive on your system.
As such, this feature cannot be enabled.

Updates_ProgUpdates.None: I'll apply updates myself, please direct me to the downloads page
Updates_ProgUpdates.DirectLinks: Use 'Direct Download Links' where possible, but I'll apply the updates
Updates_ProgUpdates.ProgDownload: Download updates and proceed to apply them for me

Update.ListTesting: List available Beta, Alpha or Concept releases
Update.UpdateCheckOnLogin: Check for database updates upon Windows Login
Update.UpdateCheckOnStartup: Check for program and database updates upon startup
Update.IncrementalUpdates: Don't rebuild the database, use incremental updates
Update.RemindCheckUpdates: Remind me to check for updates once a week
Update.PromptUser: Display a dialog prompt whenever a update is available

SeparateArchives.Enable: Create a separate archive for each entry being backed up
SeparateArchives.TimeStamp: Add a time-stamp to each archive's file-name
SeparateArchives.OnChange: Create new archive upon file change (affects performance)
SeparateArchives.SepSubFolders: Organise each entry's backup archives into sub folders
SeparateArchives.PurgeCount: Consolidate archives when backup count reaches...

Backup.ValidateOnArchiveCreation: Perform validation checks on archives immediately after their creation
Backup.DuplicateArchives: Copy all backups to another directory as they're made
Backup.DefaultBackupDir: Set a default Backup Directory (overwritten by 'Cloud Options')
Backup.RescanReminder: Remind me to rescan once per session (if previous scan results are used)
Backup.ConfirmChecksumResponse: Confirm checksum response and skip entries that fail
Backup.RememberBackupSelection: Remember the entries I select between sessions

SepArchives.Info:
Using the form below, specify what entries (if any) you'd like to create 'time-stamped' entries for.
All entries left un-ticked will follow your settings as specified in 'Task Specific->Backup Settings'.

SyncLink.Info:
To help save space on your Cloud Service of choice, Sync & Link only lists directories that meet certain criteria.
Here you can overwrite GameSave Manager's cautious listing routine to meet your needs.
SyncLink.IgnoreExclusionRules: List directory entries regardless of their file exclusion rule-set
SyncLink.WaitAfterEachLink: After a link's creation, await user input before proceeding to next entry
SyncLink.CustomSubfolder: Let me specify the sub-folder to use

Spreader.SteamRunningCheck: Warn me if Steam is running when necessary
Spreader.HideXCOPY: Hide the XCOPY command window from view

ArchiveCreation.UseCompression: Use maximum compression ratio possible (drastically affects performance)

SevZip.UseLargePages: Use 'large pages' for theoretically faster compression

Flash.Enable: Search in the 'Flash cache' for saves

Detection.SaveScanResults: Save detection results for faster detection in future
Detection.DetectSize: Try and detect file sizes of saves
Detection.CheckForDupDirs: Prevent duplicate directories from being listed
Detection.RescanOnIdle: Upon system idle, rescan for supported saves
Detection.ShowStatusInfo: Display additional info when scanning (may affect scan speeds)

SortEntries.SortByName: Sort detected entries by entry name
SortEntries.SortByDate: Sort detected entries by 'last modified' date
SortEntries.SortBySize: Sort detected entries by entry's file-size
SortEntries.SortByCustomEntries: Sort by status; Custom Entries listed first

IgnoredEntries.Info:
Tick the entries you wish to no longer search for.
NOTE: Requires a full rescan for this to take affect.

IgnoreSteam.Info:
Specify the Steam Cloud IDs and User Caches you wish to exclude when scanning for saves.
NOTE: This only affects detection for backups / Sync & Link.

ExternalScripts.Info:
External Scripts can enhance your backups in many ways.
Here, you can enable / disable scripts as well as change any available options they may have.

Intro.Info: What would you like to do?
Intro.Export: Export existing settings and custom entries

Step1.Info: Using the form below, please specify the backup that you wish to restore. When you're ready, click 'Next >' to begin.

Step2.Loading: Please wait while GameSave Manager reads the archive you selected. This may take a few moments.
Step2.Info: Using the options below, please select what you wish to import.
Step2.CustomEntries: Restore the following Custom Gamesave Entries...

Step3.Success:
Your selection has been successfully restored from the following backup...
%FILE%
Step3.Failed:
Unfortunately, there was an error when trying to restore your selection.
Error Details: --- %ERROR%

Step1.Info: Using the options below, please select what you wish to export.
Step1.CustomEntries: Include the following Custom Gamesave Entries...

Step2.Info: Please specify where to save your settings backup below. Once you're ready, click 'Next >' to start the backup procedure.

Step3.Success:
Your settings have successfully been backed up to the following location...
%FILE%
Step3.Failed:
Unfortunately, the backup failed to correctly generate.
Error Details: --- %ERROR%

Errors.InvalidFile: The backup archive you selected doesn't appear to be a valid settings backup.
Errors.NothingSelected: In order to proceed, you must specify at least one option.
Errors.NoFile:
No file specified.
Please specify a backup archive and try again.
